bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to John R. Bullard, May 23, 1941

div1.p: Hench sends some photographs to Bullard. He has not had time to write up Bullard's story, but will do so soon.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to John R. Bullard, May 23, 1941
div1.opener:
May 23, 1941
Mr. John R. Bullard
St. Augustine, Florida
My dear Mr. Bullard:
div1.p:
It has indeed been quite a time since I saw
you but I have been attending many medical meetings.

I thought you would like to have these snapshots
which I took of you and if you would like to borrow the
film I should be only too glad to send it to you. I
haven't had time to write up your story yet but I will
do so in the next few weeks and submit it to you for
your correction and approval.
div1.closer: Very sincerely and hastily yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
